anya-e0102n4:2_1: Dhātūnaṁ anantaraṁ uddiṭṭhāni pana indriyānīti bāvīsatindriyāni –
anya-e0102n4:2_2: cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyanti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n4:4_0: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:5_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṁ tāva cakkhatīti cakkhūtiādinā nayena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0102n4:5_1: Pacchimesu pana tīsu paṭhamaṁ pubbabhāge anaññātaṁ amataṁ padaṁ catusaccadhammaṁ vā jānissāmīti evaṁ paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:5_3: Tatiyaṁ aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitaññāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:6_9: Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṁ ulliṅgenti.
anya-e0102n4:6_10: Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:6_11: Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:6_12: Teneva bhagavatā munindena kānici gocarāsevanāya kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenāpi indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:7_1: Cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi cakkhādīnaṁ siddhaṁ ādhipaccaṁ, tasmiṁ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti.
anya-e0102n4:8_0: Lakkhaṇādīhīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānehipi cakkhādīnaṁ vinicchayaṁ vijāniyāti attho.
anya-e0102n4:8_1: Tāni ca nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttāneva.
anya-e0102n4:9_1: Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṁ desitāni.
anya-e0102n4:9_2: So pana attabhāvo yaṁ dhammaṁ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṁ gacchati, ayaṁ soti nidassanatthaṁ tato itthindriyaṁ purisindriyañca.
anya-e0102n4:9_3: So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṁ tato jīvitindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_4: Yāva tassa pavatti, tāva etesaṁ vedayitānaṁ anivatti.
anya-e0102n4:9_5: Yañca kiñci vedayitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṁ tato sukhindriyādīni.
anya-e0102n4:9_6: Taṁnirodhatthaṁ pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṁ tato saddhādīni.
anya-e0102n4:9_7: Imāya paṭipattiyā esa dhammo paṭhamaṁ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṁ tato anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_8: Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṁ bhāvetabbato ca tato aññindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_9: Tato paraṁ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmiṁ natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṁ ante paramassāsabhūtaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
anya-e0102n4:10_2: Sesānaṁ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṁ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n4:11_1: Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato yaṁ taṁ indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbaṁ attano tikkhamandādibhāvena cakkhuviññāṇādidhammānaṁ tikkhamandādisaṅkhātaṁ attākārānuvattāpanaṁ, idaṁ kiccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:11_11: Aññātāvindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahānañceva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti evamettha kiccato vinicchayaṁ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n4:12_3: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evamettha bhūmitopi vinicchayaṁ vijāneyya.
anya-e0102n4:17_2: dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccanti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n4:24_0: Tattha vibhāgatoti dukkhādīnaṁ hi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā, ye dukkhādīni abhisamentehi abhisametabbā. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:24_1: “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho, ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0102n4:24_5: Ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:24_6: Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi.
anya-e0102n4:24_7: Iti evaṁ vibhattānaṁ catunnaṁ catunnaṁ atthānaṁ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti.
anya-e0102n4:25_1: Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedatoti ettha pana nibbacanato tāva idha du-iti ayaṁ saddo kucchite dissati.
anya-e0102n4:25_7: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:26_0: Saṁ-iti ca ayaṁ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṁyogaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0102n4:26_4: Iti dukkhassa saṁyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:27_0: Tatiyasaccaṁ pana yasmā ni-saddo abhāvaṁ, rodha-saddo ca cārakaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0102n4:27_1: Tasmā abhāvo ettha saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṁ saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti, tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:28_0: Catutthasaccaṁ pana yasmā etaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhabhūtattā, paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā.
anya-e0102n4:29_1: Yasmā panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n4:29_5: Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_8: manussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_9: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:29_10: “imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_11: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0102n4:29_12: Ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:29_13: “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:30_2: Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, santāpanarasaṁ, pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:30_7: Tathā saṅkhatataṇhā asaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha lakkhaṇādippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:31_0: 533.Atthatthuddhāratocevāti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce?
anya-e0102n4:31_1: Yo paññācakkhunā upaparikkhamānānaṁ māyāva viparīto, marīciva visaṁvādako, titthiyānaṁ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti, atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n4:31_2: Esa aggilakkhaṇaṁ viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:31_3: “idaṁ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro. Apica –
anya-e0102n4:32_0: Nābādhakaṁ yato dukkhaṁ, dukkhā aññaṁ na bādhakaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:34_0: Taṁ vinā nāññato dukkhaṁ, na hoti na ca taṁ tato;
anya-e0102n4:36_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṁ na ca na taṁ yato;
anya-e0102n4:38_0: Maggā aññaṁ na niyyānaṁ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
anya-e0102n4:43_6: “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0102n4:43_7: “Ekaṁ hi saccaṁ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
anya-e0102n4:43_9: Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha atthuddhāratopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:44_0: 535.Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti ce?
anya-e0102n4:44_2: Na hi etehi aññaṁ adhikaṁ vā, etesaṁ vā ekampi apanetabbaṁ sambhoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:44_3: “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:44_4: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:44_6: “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ, ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:45_0: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṁ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:45_2: Tathā pariññeyyapahātabbasacchikātabbabhāvetabbānaṁ, taṇhāvatthutaṇhātaṇhānirodhataṇhānirodhupāyānaṁ, ālayaālayārāmatāālayasamugghātaālayasamugghātupāyānañca vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:46_1: Ettha ca oḷārikattā, sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_5: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṁ vā sattānaṁ saṁvegajananatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dukkhamāha.
anya-e0102n4:46_6: Taṁ neva akataṁ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_7: Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṁviggamānasānaṁ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṁ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ nirodhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_8: Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṁ nirodhasampāpakaṁ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:47_0: 537.Jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ, saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā, “yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī.
anya-e0102n4:47_1: Seyyathidaṁ, kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā”ti samudayaniddese tividhā taṇhā, “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti evaṁ nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbānaṁ, “katamaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ, ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
anya-e0102n4:47_4: sammāsamādhī”ti evaṁ magganiddese aṭṭha dhammāti iti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ niddese jātiādayo dhammā vuttā, tesaṁ jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāpi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:50_1: Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha bhave āgato.
anya-e0102n4:50_2: “Atthi, visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātī”ti ettha nikāye.
anya-e0102n4:50_4: “Yaṁ mātukucchismiṁ paṭhamaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ, paṭhamaṁ viññāṇaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti ettha paṭisandhiyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:50_7: “Yatohaṁ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti ettha ariyasīle.
anya-e0102n4:51_1: Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṁ, tāva pavattesu khandhesu.
anya-e0102n4:51_4: Nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṁ sattānaṁ ye ye khandhā pātubhavanti, tesaṁ tesaṁ paṭhamapātubhāvo jāti nāma.
anya-e0102n4:52_0: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, niyyātanarasā, atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.
anya-e0102n4:53_5: dukkhadukkhaṁ, vipariṇāmadukkhaṁ, saṅkhāradukkhaṁ, paṭicchannadukkhaṁ, appaṭicchannadukkhaṁ, pariyāyadukkhaṁ, nippariyāyadukkhanti.
anya-e0102n4:54_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:56_0: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:56_1: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n4:57_0: Dvattiṁsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n4:58_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṁ sesaṁ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṁ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:59_0: Tatrāyaṁ jāti yaṁ taṁ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṁ āpāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ dukkhaṁ uppajjati, tassa vatthubhāvato dukkhā.
anya-e0102n4:60_2: ayaṁ hi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati, atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṁ vemajjhe paramasambādhe tibbandhakārenānākuṇapagandhaparibhāvitaparamaduggandhapavanavicarite adhimattajegucche kucchipadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
anya-e0102n4:60_3: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṁ viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādirahito adhimattaṁ dukkhamanubhotīti, idaṁ tāva gabbhokkantimūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:61_0: Yaṁ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato eḷako viya ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhūnananiddhūnanādinā upakkamena adhimattaṁ dukkhamanubhavati, yañca mātu sītūdakapānakāle sītanarakupapanno viya, uṇhayāgubhattādiajjhoharaṇakāle aṅgāravuṭṭhisamparikiṇṇo viya, loṇambilādiajjhoharaṇakāle khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇapatto viya tibbaṁ dukkhamanubhoti, idaṁ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:62_0: Yaṁ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ gabbhavipattimūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:63_0: Yaṁ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṁ viya atibhayānakaṁ yonimaggaṁ paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghātapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ vijāyanamūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:64_0: Yaṁ pana jātassa taruṇavaṇasadisasukhumālasarīrassa hatthagahaṇanahāpanadhovanacoḷaparimajjanādikāle sūcimukhakhuradhārāhi vijjhanaphālanasadisaṁ dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ mātukucchito bahinikkhamanamūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:65_0: Yaṁ tato paraṁ pavattiyaṁ attanāva attānaṁ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa, kodhavasena abhuñjantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ attūpakkamamūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:65_1: Yaṁ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati, idaṁ parūpakkamamūlakaṁ dukkhanti.
anya-e0102n4:66_0: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṁ jāti vatthumeva hoti.
anya-e0102n4:74_0: Yaṁ taṁ kathaṁ tattha bhaveyya jātiṁ,
anya-e0102n4:82_0: Na taṁ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
anya-e0102n4:87_0: Jātiṁ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
anya-e0102n4:88_0: Kiṁ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṁ kuhiñci,
anya-e0102n4:94_0: 542.Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṁ ekabhavapariyāpannakhandhapurāṇabhāvo ca, sā idha adhippetā.
anya-e0102n4:94_1: Sā panesā jarā khandhaparipākalakkhaṇā, maraṇūpanayanarasā, yobbanavināsapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n4:94_3: Yaṁ hi aṅgapaccaṅgasithilībhāvaindriyavikāravirūpatāyobbanavināsabalūpaghātasatimativippavāsaparaparibhavādianekapaccayaṁ kāyikacetasikadukkhaṁ uppajjati, jarā tassa vatthu.
anya-e0102n4:99_0: “Pappoti dukkhaṁ yaṁ macco, kāyikaṁ mānasaṁ tathā;
anya-e0102n4:100_0: Sabbametaṁ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:103_0: 543.Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṁ maraṇaṁ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “jarāmaraṇaṁ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti.
anya-e0102n4:103_1: Ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitindriyappabandhavicchedo ca, yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “niccaṁ maraṇato bhaya”nti.
anya-e0102n4:103_3: Jātipaccayā maraṇaṁ upakkamamaraṇaṁ sarasamaraṇaṁ āyukkhayamaraṇaṁ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:113_1: Sokādīsu soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo.
anya-e0102n4:113_3: Evaṁ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parijjhāpanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n4:117_0: Dukkhampi vividhaṁ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:127_0: 546.Dukkhaṁ nāma kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ, taṁ kāyapīḷanalakkhaṇaṁ, duppaññānaṁ domanassakaraṇarasaṁ, kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:129_0: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0102n4:132_3: Cetodukkhasamappitā hi kese pakiriya kandanti, urāni paṭipisanti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti, uddhaṁpādaṁ papatanti, satthaṁ āharanti, visaṁ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṁ pavisantīti taṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhamanubhavanti.
anya-e0102n4:133_0: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṁ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṁ samāvahati;
anya-e0102n4:137_3: Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaparidahanato kāyavisādanato ca.
anya-e0102n4:138_0: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:139_0: Yaṁ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti.
anya-e0102n4:141_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko.
anya-e0102n4:141_1: Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṁ viya paridevo.
anya-e0102n4:141_2: Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamituṁ appahontassa antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n4:157_0: 551.Yampicchaṁ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva yampicchaṁ na labhati, tampi dukkhanti vuttā.
anya-e0102n4:159_0: Yaṁ vighātamayaṁ dukkhaṁ, sattānaṁ idha jāyati.
anya-e0102n4:166_0: Avuttaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vinā ete na vijjati.
anya-e0102n4:169_0: Tathā hi indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva paharaṇāni, gorūpaṁ viya ḍaṁsamakasādayo, khettamiva lāyakā, gāmaṁ viya gāmaghātakā upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṁ, pupphaphalapallavāni viya rukkhesu upādānakkhandhesuyeva nibbattanti.
anya-e0102n4:169_1: Upādānakkhandhānañca ādidukkhaṁ jāti, majjhedukkhaṁ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṁ maraṇaṁ, māraṇantikadukkhābhighātena pariḍayhanadukkhaṁ soko, tadasahanato lālappanadukkhaṁ paridevo, tato dhātukkhobhasaṅkhātaaniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbasamāyogato kāyassa ābādhanadukkhaṁ dukkhaṁ, tena bādhiyamānānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṁ domanassaṁ, sokādivuddhiyā janitavisādānaṁ anutthunanadukkhaṁ upāyāso, manorathavighātappattānaṁ icchāvighātadukkhaṁ icchitālābhoti evaṁ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva dukkhāti.
anya-e0102n4:169_2: Yadetaṁ ekamekaṁ dassetvā vuccamānaṁ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṁ, tasmā taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṁ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu saṁkhipitvā dassetuṁ “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
anya-e0102n4:172_1: Samudayaniddese pana yāyaṁ taṇhāti yā ayaṁ taṇhā.
anya-e0102n4:172_2: Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṁ punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlametissāti ponobbhavikā.
anya-e0102n4:172_3: Nandīrāgena sahagatāti nandīrāgasahagatā, nandīrāgena saddhiṁ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n4:172_4: Tatra tatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati, tatra tatrābhinandinī.
anya-e0102n4:172_5: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa sā katamāti ceti attho.
anya-e0102n4:172_6: Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissanti.
anya-e0102n4:172_7: Idha panāyaṁ tividhāpi dukkhasaccassa nibbattakaṭṭhena ekattaṁ upanetvā dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccanti vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n4:175_1: Dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyātiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto, so kasmāti ce?
anya-e0102n4:175_3: Samudayanirodhena hi dukkhaṁ nirujjhati, na aññathā. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n4:180_0: Iti yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṁ nirujjhati, tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṁ desento samudayanirodheneva desesi.
anya-e0102n4:180_2: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
anya-e0102n4:180_4: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale paṭipajjanti, na hetumhīti.
anya-e0102n4:180_5: Evaṁ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya payojanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:181_2: tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena vibhattataṇhāya.
anya-e0102n4:181_7: Atha vā virāgoti pahānaṁ vuccati, tasmā aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n4:181_8: Atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni.
anya-e0102n4:181_9: Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:181_10: Yasmā pana taṁ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, tasmā virāgoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:181_11: Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo honti, kāmaguṇālayesu cettha ekopi ālayo natthi, tasmā “cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:182_1: Tayidaṁ santilakkhaṇaṁ, accutirasaṁ, assāsakaraṇarasaṁ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ, nippapañcapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ vā.
anya-e0102n4:184_1: Nattheva nibbānaṁ, sasavisāṇaṁ viya anupalabbhanīyatoti ce?
anya-e0102n4:184_3: Upalabbhati hi taṁ tadanurūpapaṭipattisaṅkhātena upāyena, cetopariyañāṇena paresaṁ lokuttaracittaṁ viya, tasmā “anupalabbhanīyato natthī”ti na vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:184_4: Na hi “yaṁ bālaputhujjanā na upalabhanti, taṁ natthī”ti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:185_1: Apica nibbānaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ, kasmā?
anya-e0102n4:185_3: Asati hi nibbāne sammādiṭṭhipurejavāya sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:185_8: Na, tesaṁ abhāvāsambhavato, abhāve ca avattamānabhāvāpajjanato, vattamānakkhandhanissitamaggakkhaṇe ca sopādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā abhāvadosato.
anya-e0102n4:185_9: Tadā kilesānaṁ avattamānattā na dosoti ce.
anya-e0102n4:185_11: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:186_3: Tampi hi “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:186_5: Evañhi sati nibbānaṁ ittarakālaṁ, saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṁ, sammāvāyāmanirapekkhādhigamanīyabhāvañca āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:186_6: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇattāyeva ca saṅkhatapariyāpannaṁ, saṅkhatapariyāpannattā rāgādīhi aggīhi ādittaṁ, ādittattā dukkhañcātipi āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:186_7: Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti, tassa nibbānabhāvato na dosoti ce.
anya-e0102n4:186_9: Bhāvepi cassa vuttappakāradosānativattanato, ariyamaggassa ca nibbānabhāvāpajjanato.
anya-e0102n4:186_10: Ariyamaggo hi dose khīṇeti, tasmā khayoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:186_11: Tato ca paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo dosānaṁ pavattīti.
anya-e0102n4:187_0: Anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattā, yassa upanissayo hoti tadupacārena “khayo”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:187_3: Atisukhumatā cassa bhagavato apposukkabhāvāvahanato, ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca siddhāti.
anya-e0102n4:188_1: Tayidaṁ maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇaṁ, purimakoṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:189_4: Niccā uppādādīnaṁ abhāvato nibbānaṁ viyāti ce.
anya-e0102n4:190_1: Yathāvuttayuttisabbhāvato pana idameva niccaṁ, rūpasabhāvātikkamato arūpaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:190_3: Yena bhāvanāya pattaṁ, tassa kilesavūpasamaṁ, upādisesañca upādāya paññāpanīyattā saha upādisesena paññāpiyatīti saupādisesaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:190_4: Yo cassa samudayappahānena upahatāyatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddhaṁ pavattikhandhānaṁ anuppādanato, uppannānañca antaradhānato upādisesābhāvo, taṁ upādāya paññāpanīyato natthi ettha upādisesoti anupādisesaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:191_0: Asithilaparakkamasiddhena ñāṇavisesena adhigamanīyato, sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthena sabhāvato nibbānaṁ nāvijjamānaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:191_1: Vuttañhetaṁ “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhata”nti.
anya-e0102n4:194_1: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese vuttā pana aṭṭha dhammā kāmaṁ khandhaniddesepi atthato pakāsitāyeva, idha pana nesaṁ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṁ visesāvabodhanatthaṁ vadāma.
anya-e0102n4:194_2: Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṁ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṁ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0102n4:194_4: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṁsampayuttaṁ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṁ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṁ sammāsaṅkappo.
anya-e0102n4:195_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṁsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā nāma.
anya-e0102n4:195_2: Tathā viramato taṁsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto nāma.
anya-e0102n4:195_4: Yā panassa tesaṁ sammāvācākammantānaṁ visuddhibhūtā taṁsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā micchājīvavirati, so sammāājīvo nāma.
anya-e0102n4:196_0: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo taṁsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho, esa sammāvāyāmo nāma.
anya-e0102n4:196_2: Tassevaṁ vāyamato taṁsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma.
anya-e0102n4:196_4: Evaṁ anuttarāya satiyā saṁrakkhiyamānacittassa taṁsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṁsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma.
anya-e0102n4:197_3: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṁ lokiyaṁ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati.
anya-e0102n4:197_4: Paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ nirodhamārammaṇaṁ katvā kiccato cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:197_5: “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passatī”ti sabbaṁ vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:198_0: Yaṁ panetaṁ lokiyaṁ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṁ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n4:198_4: Dukkhañāṇaṁ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṁ phale vippaṭipattiṁ.
anya-e0102n4:198_5: Samudayañāṇaṁ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṁ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṁ.
anya-e0102n4:198_7: Maggañāṇaṁ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṁ upāye vippaṭipattiṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n4:200_0: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:202_0: 564.Antogadhānaṁ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṁ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā.
anya-e0102n4:202_8: Sabbesaṁyeva vā etesaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṁ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṁ atthitāya atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā.
anya-e0102n4:202_11: Sammāsamādhiapadesena savitakkasavicārādayo tayo samādhī cittasamādhi samādhindriyasamādhibalapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgāni antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṁ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:203_0: 565.Upamātoti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṁ, bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, bhāranikkhepanupāyo viya maggasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:203_1: Rogo viya ca dukkhasaccaṁ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṁ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṁ, bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:203_2: Dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṁ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṁ, subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:203_3: Apica verī-veramūla-verasamugghāta-verasamugghātupāyehi, visarukkha-rukkhamūla-mūlupaccheda-tadupacchedupāyehi, bhaya-bhayamūla-nibbhaya-tadadhigamupāyehi, orimatīra-mahoghapārimatīra-taṁsampāpakavāyāmehi ca yojetvāpetāni upamāto veditabbānīti evamettha upamāto vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:204_0: 566.Catukkatoti atthi cettha dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ, atthi ariyasaccaṁ na dukkhaṁ, atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:204_2: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṁ, na ariyasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:204_4: Itaraṁ pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā dukkhaṁ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathattena.
anya-e0102n4:204_5: Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāya.
anya-e0102n4:204_6: Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:204_7: Evaṁ samudayādīsupi yathāyogaṁ yojetvā catukkatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:205_1: Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n4:213_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño.
anya-e0102n4:213_1: Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassābhāvato, magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya.
anya-e0102n4:213_2: Hetusuññañca phalaṁ dukkhasamudayānaṁ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṁ hetuphalaṁ samavāyavādīnaṁ dviaṇukādi viya.
anya-e0102n4:215_0: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṁhetunā suñña”nti.
anya-e0102n4:221_3: Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:222_0: “Na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā, tīhi ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito.
anya-e0102n4:222_1: Yā cāvuso visākha, sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n4:222_2: Yo ca sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n4:222_3: Yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:223_0: Ettha hi sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva, tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n4:223_1: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṁ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavaseneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:223_2: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ na sakkoti, vīriye pana paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro hutvā sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:224_1: yathā hi nakkhattaṁ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṁ campakarukkhaṁ disvā hatthaṁ ukkhipitvā gahetumpi na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n4:224_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṁ dadeyya, so tassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n4:224_4: So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṁ kīḷeyya.
anya-e0102n4:225_0: Ekato uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
anya-e0102n4:225_2: Hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ asakkonto samādhi.
anya-e0102n4:225_5: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṁ gahetuṁ sakkoti, evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ.
anya-e0102n4:225_6: Tasmā samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena saṅgahito, vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.
anya-e0102n4:226_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_1: Vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0102n4:226_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṁ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_3: Aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṁ sakkoti, evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_4: Abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_5: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā, sammāsaṅkappo pana kiriyavasena saṅgahito hoti.
anya-e0102n4:227_0: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n4:228_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā, abhiññeyyattā vā.
anya-e0102n4:228_3: Catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:229_0: 569.Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti sabbāneva saccāni aññamaññaṁ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:230_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, ānanda, katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā, yo vā dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ, yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti?
anya-e0102n4:230_1: Etadeva, bhante, dukkaratarañceva durabhisambhavatarañca, yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti.
anya-e0102n4:230_2: Tato kho te, ānanda, duppaṭivijjhataraṁ paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0102n4:231_1: Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā lokiyattā sāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n4:231_3: Pacchimānipi dve sabhāgāni gambhīrattena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n4:232_0: Iti evaṁ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
